content.prompt: The effect of mentioning an "Academy portrait" (Paragraph 2) is to

choices.label: imply that Terry deserved to have her portrait painted by a great artist
suggest that Terry was adept at self-expression both in writing and in painting
clarify the informal nature of Terry's self-portrait through contrast
hint that Terry's self-absorption prevented her from writing about herself dispassionately

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
